short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: you can easily read web pages in your bookmark folder.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is simple extension to browse pages in your bookmark folder.

You can easily switch web pages in your specific bookmark folder.


1. First click empty input box few times and get your root bookmark folder.

2. Reopen few times this extension, and bookmark folder list suggest appear under input area when you input.

3. Input your exact folder name in input area and push enter or click search button to get pages.

You can switch pages by click or wheel up and down on the lists.


Enjoy browsing life.
